column1:
{{Property proposal |status = not done |description = the diagonal screen size |infobox parameter = |datatype = number |domain = devices with a screen (for example computers or smartphones) |allowed values = |suggested values = |source = |example =
[[Q49047|Nexus 4]] => 4.7 ''
[[Q49047|Nexus 4]] => 11,938 cm |filter = |robot and gadget jobs = A bot can search in the wikis for the screen size value in tables. |proposed by = [[Special:Contributions/88.65.195.123|88.65.195.123]] 11:14, 30 June 2013 (UTC)

:{{oppose}} Oppose without a general concept of size definition of object. Because there are plenty of other length parameters which can be used to describe an object and only a general concept can avoid the creation of specialized properties. Why not a property "Dimension" and a qualifier "element" which can be used for screen but other characteristics too ? [[User:Snipre|Snipre]] ([[User talk:Snipre|talk]]) 11:35, 1 July 2013 (UTC)
